name: Love's a Mystery!
description:
Our first visual novel and 3rd Jam game. A game about love, mysterious ongoings, and couples therapy!

You play a couples therapist taking on a client with a secret.

There were a lot of firsts in this game for our team. This was my first time using Ren’Py and drawing art, @icyysilver's first time drawing characters, and a few more. We also didn’t have a whole ton of time due to work, so we’re all pretty amazed we were able to get this done on time!

Please let us know what you think and how we can improve. I look forward to hearing everyone’s feedback and hope everyone has an amazing jam!
